document_data.name: ''Incandescent Blue Ioun Stone''
document_data.mainbody: An '''''incandescent blue ioun stone''''' was a type of spherical [[ioun stone]].
document_data.Powers: These blue ioun stones increased the wisdom of the wearer.
document_data.History: In [[1311 DR]], a specific [[incandescent blue ioun stone (githzerai)|ioun stone of this variety]] lost to its owner, the [[illithid]] called [[Oinchalk'olp]]. The mind flayer ordered a group of adventurers to fetch the [[githzerai]]-crafted stone.
document_data.Notable Owners:
* [[Bashenee]], the original creator of one of these stones
* Oinchalk'olp
